response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am excited to present our top-of-the-line product that has been meticulously designed and crafted with the highest quality materials. This product not only stands as a testament to innovation but also offers unparalleled performance and durability. Given its exceptional features and craftsmanship, it's valued at $15,000 by us.
